The proposed modification of the planning area will ensure the restoration of some omissions, the transfer of rights already granted and the modified use resulting from land sales. This plan area further provides within the residential area only for the restoration of some omissions, a translation of rights already acquired and changes in destination due to land sales. These are the changes that are being made as a result of various land sales, the transfer of rights already acquired with an environmental permit and changes that monitor the restoration of omissions.
